﻿All sizes are approximate measurements

[Information]

 

Polyester Square Tablecloth

Give your plain and lackluster tables a fresh festive look with these premium quality Polyester Tablecloths. Crafted from high grade polyester with seamless finish, these Square Tablecloths will dress your tables to the nines. Perfect for high-end events and celebrations, these stylish linens are ideal to add a dash of sophistication to your daily dining as well.

Stain & Wrinkle Resistant

Featuring stain and wrinkle resistant attributes, our best quality Polyester Tablecloths are an ideal accessory to give your drab tables a quick classy makeover. With top quality Polyester material and hemmed edges, these exquisite tablecloths are color-fast and can withstand extensive use. Get the linen in size and color of your choice and continue glamming your events up for years to come.

    

Multi-Use

Swathe atop wedding tables, banquet tables, head tables, party tables, or spread on your backyard bench to make a chic picnic table for sweet celebrations and special events. Pair with our Polyester Table Overlays, Table Runners, Table Napkins, and Table Skirts for a truly upscale look and effect.

 

 Additional Information:

  • Quantity: 1 Square Tablecloth
  • Material: 100% Polyester
  • Size: 54" x 54"
  • 1 piece, seamless design
  • Hemmed edges for an exquisite look.
  • How to Care: Tablecloths are machine washable. Use warm water wash, low temp dry.
  • For Tablecloth only, decorations not included
  • Uses : Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration

    Splaying from all the sides, our gorgeously flared pom poms are absolutely fab! Dangling magically from your ceilings, tree branches, or fixtures, these fluffy pom poms seem to float enchantingly in midair.

    These paper pom poms are an amazing embellishment to every occasion. From rehearsal dinners to weddings, showers to Halloween and Christmas Parties, or even birthday bashes, these vibrant hanging puffs provide a cheery and whimsical way to add more color and verve to any party venue.

    Hang them up a ceiling or a tree, bundle them high into corners, place around a candle holder, make into a centerpiece atop a centerpiece holder, or snip away for a paper project-whatever your urges, fancies, and out-of-the-box plans are, use these fanciful pom poms to impart a fluffier, softer, and dreamlike look to them!

entry.title: 110 Pack DIY Balloon Garland Kit, Balloon Arch Party Decorations - Peach, Gray, Cream, White, Yellow
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_3220
Type: Decorations
Price: 11.69

[About]

Quantity: 110 Balloon Garland Kit

12" Balloon Packs: 

  • Peach - 20 Pcs
  • Gray - 10 Pcs
  • Cream - 10 Pcs
  • White - 10 Pcs

5" Balloon Packs:

  • Peach - 20 Pcs
  • Yellow - 20 Pcs
  • Gray - 10 Pcs
  • White  - 10 Pcs

    Balloon Garland Kit:

    • Clear Plastic Chain: 5 Meters
    • Balloon Dots: Roll of 100
    • Balloon Tying Tool: 1 Qty
    • Garland instruction on pack
    Color: Peach | Gray | Cream | White | Yellow
    Shape: Sphere Balloon
    All sizes are approximate measurements
    Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.


    [Information]

    No festivity is complete without colorful festive balloons and to give you a huge dose of fun and frolic, our Balloon Kit in celebratory colors is an ideal option. Get any party started with our best quality balloons available in cheerful colors. Compared to the ordinary balloons available in the market, our sturdy balloons are bigger, bolder, and better!
    Fun, festive colors coupled with sleek smooth surface will instantly transform any dull space into an excitingly cheerful realm. Perfect for merry moments like Weddings, Showers, Birthdays, Graduations, Anniversaries, Halloween Party, Christmas Functions, Holiday Events, and any other celebration that calls for an extra dash of color and charisma.
    Create breathtaking Balloon Arches, Balloon Columns, Table Centerpieces, and Balloon Bouquets by clipping the balloons together with our Balloon Buckle Clips, or use in coordination with our Tassels, Pompoms, Foil Letter and Number Balloons and Banners for a fun-filled décor. Get the balloons inflated in no time with our Balloon Hand Pumps or Portable Electric Air Blower Balloon Pump Inflator. Save time, money, and energy on Party Decoration with our exciting range of Party Balloon Kits.

    Additional Information:

    • Float time is about 10 hrs for the 12" balloons. Blow balloons up with helium closer to the time of event for it to last.
    • The 5" balloons will likely not float due to the size of the balloon and the amount of helium it occupies.
    • Uses: Perfect for balloon arch decoration, baby shower, weddings, graduations, anniversaries, corporate events, engagements, BBQs, photo shoots and more!
    • High Quality: These balloons are made of latex material, strong and durable enough to inflate for decoration, safe to use.
    • WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD -- Children under 8 yrs. can choke or suffocate on uninflated or broken balloons. Adult supervision required. Keep uninflated balloons from children. Discard broken balloons at once.

      How To Make Balloon Garland:

      • Inflate all balloons with air and tie a knot using Balloon Tying Tool.
      • Insert balloon lips into decorating strip holes and gently pull balloon knots through the holes to secure. Alternate balloon colors and sizes and skip holes as needed on decorating strip as you attach balloons.
      • Use the dot glue makes it easy to fill the gap of balloons with smaller balloons.
      • Tie a long piece of ribbon to an empty hole at each end of the decorating strip and hang garland against a wall or from the ceiling.

      NOTE:  Total length depends on the setting of balloons. DIY item, total length may vary!

entry.title: 5 Pack | 22" x 78" Mustard Yellow DIY Premium Designer Chiffon Chair Sashes
entry.summary:
Vendor: eFavormart
Type: Chair Sashes
Price: 8.99

[About]

  • Quantity: 5 Sashes
  • Material: Chiffon
  • Color: Mustard Yellow
  • Size: 22" wide x 78" long
  • All sizes are approximate measurements
  • Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.
  • Buy Sash Buckles

[Information]

Our soft Chiffon Sashes are perhaps one of our most exquisite sash options! Sheer soft flowing feel and lightweight luxurious look of this sash adds the perfect delicate elegance touch to any event! Made from premium quality chiffon, the dreamlike draping effect of these sashes will transform your simple party chairs into royal seats. Besides having seamless stylish appearance, these sashes are also durable enough to continue accentuating your party chairs for many years with the same flawless flair.

Easy to shape and work with, chiffon fabric gives plenty of options to adorn your party or banquet chairs; pair with our Satin or Spandex Chair Belts and Covers, embellish with our Jeweled Sash Clips and Pins, or add our Sash Flowers for a refreshing feel. If you wish to make your event simply outshine all the rest, we recommend our favorite “weaved” style that can be created by interlacing multiple chiffon sashes on a Chiavari chair!

Additional Information:

  • Each order is for 5 sashes. Sashes are shipped untied.
  • How to Care: Hand wash only. Hang dry, Don't use dryer
  • For sashes only, does not include any other decorations
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration

    [Information]

    Spread these Chiffon Table runners charmingly atop your colorful or plain table covers to add a dreamy aspect to your tablescape. It can give a softer feel to a rustic wood table top or can be themed with some plain linen to create a change in texture. Gather it as much or as little as you want or tie it off with ribbon to create beautiful folds.

    Pair these with botanicals, taper candleholders, compote bowls, candle holders, delicate florals, geometric terrariums, agate ideas, candlestick holders, candelabras for a chic wedding look. These runners can be used on your guest tables or to enhance side tables at your venue. Place over wooden entrance tables or your guest book table for that extra special touch.

    Additional Information:

    • For Table Runner only, does not include any other decorations
    • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Restaurant Decoration
